DOC.brief_summary: This study design examine different form creatine impact active male .
DOC.brief_title: Physiological Effects Creatine Supplementation Active Males
DOC.detailed_description: This study examine effect different formulation creatine nitrate muscle creatine content , body composition , anaerobic exercise capacity , bench press performance clinical chemistry panel recreationally active male .
DOC.criteria: participant apparently healthy recreationally active male age 18 40 ; participant need least six month immediate prior history resistance training bench press leg press squat ; participant history treatment metabolic disease ( i.e. , diabetes ) , hypertension , hypotension , thyroid disease , arrhythmias and/or cardiovascular disease ; participant currently use prescription medication ; participant history smoking ; participant drink excessively ( i.e. , 12 drink per week ) ; participant recent history creatine supplementation within six week start supplementation ;
